name: 博麗神社
description:
This is my first #LDJAM Game !
This is made by GameMaker, so you may need to install the game first
And this is a reaction game by using left click to hit the reimu's head, and right click to stop the time.
Hope you enjoy for this :)
And also it is all pixel style in the game
---------
Reimu and hakurei shrine is come from touhou project, and the place at the good end is from Japan "Akihabara", and kuro is my own character.
The Story is about Kuro cross to the world "gensokyo", and if you will find that it is all because of reimu at the good end
----------
